name: Delayed
description:
Play the role of a troubled, low salary, space delivery man, who after an unfortunate space accident with some space rocks, is knocked off course from his delivery route and crash lands on a desert planet, inhabited by evil Land-sharks.

You must find as many packages as you can, avoid or kill the Land-sharks, and make it to a space taxi rank before you are really late with your deliveries.

A game made by Nathaniel Tyler Jones (A lowly Games Design student)

Twitter - @NathanielTylerJ

Portfolio - http://nathan1995jones.wix.com/nathanjonesportfoli...
